alert.note: Alert for Cape May; Cumberland (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 10:55PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Cumberland and northwestern Cape May Counties through 1130 PM EDT... At 1055 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Fortesque, or 16 miles east of Dover, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Vineland, Millville, Cumberland, Laurel Lake, Newport, Mauricetown, Leesburg, Port Norris, Dividing Creek, Bricksboro, Port Elizabeth, Bivalve, Fortesque and Eldora. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
